name: Isles of Dünya - Level01
description:
Help Elvi collect special flowers only found on the Isles of Dünya

These flowers emit the most curious light particles, and thrive in secluded regions...

Requirements:

- XBOX controller (USB)

You must unzip the file and then click "Application.exe" to play the game.

I am still a beginner in game development, so if you have any feedback on style or functionality,  please let me know! 

Amanda

PS. You could also use arrow keys and spacebar, but this is quite difficult.
